original_text: Think about this: The people who work in the temple get their food from that place. The priests who offer sacrifices on the altar receive part of the animals for themselves.
korean_text: 성전의 일을 하는 이들은 성전에서 나는 것을 먹으며 제단에서 섬기는 이들은 제단과 함께 나누는 것을 너희가 알지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: The people who work in the temple
get their food from that place.
The priests who offer sacrifices on the altar
receive part of the animals for themselves.
